original_text: But before God showed us the way of faith, the Law had authority over us. God's Law kept us safe, until God showed us that we must believe in Christ.
korean_text: 믿음이 오기 전에 우리는 율법 아래에 매인 바 되고 계시될 믿음의 때까지 갇혔느니라

sentences.original_text: But before God showed us the way of faith
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님이 우리에게 믿음의 길을 보여주시기 전에는

sentences.original_text: the Law had authority over us
that we must believe in Christ
